links.title: Trim
links.tooltip: Change the journey time from starting ${__from:date} and ending ${__to:date} to starting ${tripstart:date} and ending ${tripend:date}

links.title: Add journey
links.tooltip: Add selection as a new journey to the database

links.title: Today so far
links.tooltip: Use the current day as time range for journey.

targets.rawSql:
(SELECT
  $__time("startDate"),
  trips.start_position_latitude AS latitude,
  trips.start_position_longitude AS longitude
FROM trips
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("startDate") AND
  trips.vehicle_vin = '$VIN'
UNION
SELECT
  $__time("endDate"),
  trips.destination_position_latitude AS latitude,
  trips.destination_position_longitude AS longitude
FROM trips
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("endDate") AND
  trips.vehicle_vin = '$VIN'
)
ORDER BY 1

panels.description: Journey starting location and ending location

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
fromlocation.display_name AS "From",
tolocation.display_name AS "To"
FROM
(SELECT
  FIRST_VALUE("start_location_id") OVER sd AS "fromid",
  LAST_VALUE("destination_location_id") OVER sd AS "toid"
FROM trips
WHERE
  ($__timeFilter("startDate") OR $__timeFilter("endDate")) AND
  trips.vehicle_vin = '$VIN'
WINDOW sd as (ORDER BY "startDate" ASC ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND UNBOUNDED FOLLOWING)
LIMIT 1) AS fromto
JOIN locations AS fromlocation ON  fromlocation.osm_id = fromto.fromid
JOIN locations AS tolocation ON  tolocation.osm_id = fromto.toid

panels.title: ${title} From / To

panels.description: Details of the journey. If possible the consumption is calculated.

targets.rawSql:
WITH dates AS
(
  SELECT
    vehicle_vin,
    FIRST_VALUE("startDate") OVER sd AS "Start",
    LAST_VALUE("endDate") OVER sd AS "End"
  FROM trips
  WHERE
    ($__timeFilter("startDate") OR $__timeFilter("endDate")) AND
    trips.vehicle_vin = '$VIN'
  WINDOW sd as (ORDER BY "startDate" ASC ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND UNBOUNDED FOLLOWING)
  LIMIT 1
),
energy_charged AS
(
  SELECT
    SUM(COALESCE("realCharged_kWh", COALESCE(("meterEnd_kWh"-"meterStart_kWh"),
    ("endSOC_pct" - "startSOC_pct") * (
      CASE
        WHEN
          vehicles."carType" = 'ELECTRIC'
        THEN
          vehicle_settings."primary_capacity"::NUMERIC
        ELSE
          vehicle_settings."secondary_capacity"::NUMERIC
      END
      / 100::NUMERIC)))) AS "Energy Charged"
  FROM 
    charging_sessions
  LEFT JOIN vehicles ON charging_sessions.vehicle_vin = vehicles.vin
  LEFT JOIN vehicle_settings ON charging_sessions.vehicle_vin = vehicle_settings.vehicle_vin
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter("started") AND
    charging_sessions.vehicle_vin = '$VIN'  
),
refueled AS
(
  SELECT
    SUM(COALESCE("realRefueled_l",
    ("endSOC_pct" - "startSOC_pct") * ( 
      vehicle_settings."primary_capacity"::NUMERIC
      / 100::NUMERIC))) AS "Refueled"
  FROM 
    refuel_sessions
  LEFT JOIN vehicles ON refuel_sessions.vehicle_vin = vehicles.vin
  LEFT JOIN vehicle_settings ON refuel_sessions.vehicle_vin = vehicle_settings.vehicle_vin
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter("date") AND
    refuel_sessions.vehicle_vin = '$VIN'  
)

SELECT
  *,
  "Energy used (estimated)" / "Length" * 100 AS "Energy consumption / 100km",
  "Gasoline used (estimated)" / "Length" * 100 AS "Gasoline consumption / 100km"
FROM
  (
    SELECT
      FIRST_VALUE("startDate") OVER sd AS "Start",
      LAST_VALUE("endDate") OVER sd AS "End",
      FIRST_VALUE("start_mileage_km") OVER sd AS "Start Mileage",
      LAST_VALUE("end_mileage_km") OVER sd AS "End Mileage",
      (LAST_VALUE("end_mileage_km") OVER sd)-(FIRST_VALUE("start_mileage_km") OVER sd) AS "Length",
      (
        SELECT
          (startbattery."currentSOC_pct" - endbattery."currentSOC_pct") * (
            CASE
              WHEN
                vehicles."carType" = 'ELECTRIC'
              THEN
                vehicle_settings."primary_capacity"::NUMERIC
              ELSE
                vehicle_settings."secondary_capacity"::NUMERIC
            END
            / 100::NUMERIC) + (
              SELECT COALESCE("Energy Charged",0) FROM energy_charged
            ) AS "Energy used (estimated)"
        FROM
          dates
        LEFT JOIN vehicles ON dates.vehicle_vin = vehicles.vin
        LEFT JOIN vehicle_settings ON dates.vehicle_vin = vehicle_settings.vehicle_vin
        JOIN battery AS startbattery ON startbattery."carCapturedTimestamp" = (SELECT "carCapturedTimestamp" FROM battery WHERE "carCapturedTimestamp" > "Start" - interval '600 SECONDS' AND "carCapturedTimestamp" < "Start" + interval '600 SECONDS' ORDER BY ABS(EXTRACT(epoch FROM ("carCapturedTimestamp" - "Start"))) ASC LIMIT 1)
        JOIN battery AS endbattery ON endbattery."carCapturedTimestamp" = (SELECT "carCapturedTimestamp" FROM battery WHERE "carCapturedTimestamp" > "End" - interval '600 SECONDS' AND "carCapturedTimestamp" < "End" + interval '600 SECONDS' ORDER BY ABS(EXTRACT(epoch FROM ("carCapturedTimestamp" - "End"))) ASC LIMIT 1)
      ) AS "Energy used (estimated)",
      (
        SELECT
          CASE
            WHEN
              vehicles."carType" != 'ELECTRIC'
            THEN
              (startranges."primary_currentSOC_pct" - endranges."primary_currentSOC_pct") * (vehicle_settings."primary_capacity"::NUMERIC
                / 100::NUMERIC) + (
                  SELECT COALESCE("Refueled",0) FROM refueled
                )
            ELSE
              NULL
            END AS "Gasoline used (estimated)"
        FROM
          dates
        LEFT JOIN vehicles ON dates.vehicle_vin = vehicles.vin
        LEFT JOIN vehicle_settings ON dates.vehicle_vin = vehicle_settings.vehicle_vin
        JOIN ranges AS startranges ON startranges."carCapturedTimestamp" = (SELECT "carCapturedTimestamp" FROM ranges WHERE "carCapturedTimestamp" > "Start" - interval '600 SECONDS' AND "carCapturedTimestamp" < "Start" + interval '600 SECONDS' ORDER BY ABS(EXTRACT(epoch FROM ("carCapturedTimestamp" - "Start"))) ASC LIMIT 1)
        JOIN ranges AS endranges ON endranges."carCapturedTimestamp" = (SELECT "carCapturedTimestamp" FROM ranges WHERE "carCapturedTimestamp" > "End" - interval '600 SECONDS' AND "carCapturedTimestamp" < "End" + interval '600 SECONDS' ORDER BY ABS(EXTRACT(epoch FROM ("carCapturedTimestamp" - "End"))) ASC LIMIT 1)
      ) AS "Gasoline used (estimated)"
    FROM trips
    WHERE
      ($__timeFilter("startDate") OR $__timeFilter("endDate")) AND
      trips.vehicle_vin = '$VIN'
    WINDOW sd as (ORDER BY "startDate" ASC ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND UNBOUNDED FOLLOWING)
    LIMIT 1
  ) AS precalc

panels.title: Details

panels.description: Distribution of time driven and charging for the whole journey.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  'Charging' AS "type",
  EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM SUM(COALESCE("ended", "unlocked", "disconnected") - COALESCE("started", "locked", "connected"))) AS "Time"
FROM charging_sessions
WHERE
  ($__timeFilter("started") OR $__timeFilter("ended")) AND
  vehicle_vin = '$VIN'
UNION
SELECT
  'Driving' AS "type",
  EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM SUM("endDate"-"startDate")) AS "Time"
FROM trips
WHERE
  ($__timeFilter("startDate") OR $__timeFilter("endDate")) AND
  vehicle_vin = '$VIN'

panels.title: Time

panels.description: Phases of driving or charging of this journey. Use the trim button to trim the journey starting from the first driving phase until the last driving phase of the selected time range from ${__from:date} to ${__to:date}. After trim the journey starts at ${tripstart:date} and ends at at ${tripend:date}

targets.rawSql:
(
SELECT
  "carCapturedTimestamp" AS "time",
  "chargingState"::TEXT AS "State"
FROM charges
WHERE
  ("chargingState" = 'CHARGING' OR "chargingState" = 'OFF' OR "chargingState" = 'READY_FOR_CHARGING' OR "chargingState" = 'CHARGE_PURPOSE_REACHED_CONSERVATION' OR "chargingState" = 'CHARGE_PURPOSE_REACHED_NOT_CONSERVATION_CHARGING' OR "chargingState" = 'CONSERVATION') AND
  $__timeFilter("carCapturedTimestamp") AND
  vehicle_vin = '$VIN'
UNION
SELECT
  "startDate" AS time,
  'DRIVING' AS "State"
FROM trips
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("startDate") AND
  vehicle_vin = '$VIN'
UNION
SELECT
  "endDate" AS time,
  'OFF' AS "State"
FROM trips
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("endDate") AND
  vehicle_vin = '$VIN'
)
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: States

panels.description: Battery state of charge and electric range over the whole journey.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  "carCapturedTimestamp" AS "time",
  "cruisingRangeElectric_km" AS "Electric Range"
FROM battery
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("carCapturedTimestamp") AND
  vehicle_vin = '$VIN'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "carCapturedTimestamp" AS "time",
  "currentSOC_pct" AS "Battery SoC"
FROM battery
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("carCapturedTimestamp") AND
  vehicle_vin = '$VIN'
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Battery Level

panels.description: All trips for the whole journey. Not all attributes can be filled automatically. If you want to make additions or changes use the ⚙ button at the end of each row. You can also add missing trips.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  "startDate" AS "Start Date",
  COALESCE(start_locations."display_name", CONCAT_WS(', ', COALESCE(CONCAT_WS(', ', start_locations.name, start_locations.amenity), nullif(CONCAT_WS(' ', start_locations.road, start_locations.house_number), '')), start_locations.neighbourhood, start_locations.city, start_locations.postcode, start_locations.country)) AS "Start Location",
  COALESCE(destination_location."display_name", CONCAT_WS(', ', COALESCE(CONCAT_WS(', ', destination_location.name, destination_location.amenity), nullif(CONCAT_WS(' ', destination_location.road, destination_location.house_number), '')), destination_location.neighbourhood, destination_location.city, destination_location.postcode, destination_location.country)) AS "Destination Location",
  EXTRACT('epoch' FROM ("endDate"-"startDate")) AS "Duration",
  ("end_mileage_km"-"start_mileage_km") AS "Length",
  "end_mileage_km" AS "Odometer",
  '⚙' AS "Edit",
  id,
  COALESCE((round(extract(epoch FROM "startDate") - 300) * 1000)::TEXT,'now-1d') AS start_date_ts,
  COALESCE((round(extract(epoch FROM "endDate") + 300) * 1000)::TEXT,'now') AS end_date_ts
FROM trips
LEFT JOIN locations start_locations ON trips."start_location_id" = start_locations.osm_id
LEFT JOIN locations destination_location ON trips."destination_location_id" = destination_location.osm_id
WHERE
  ($__timeFilter("startDate") OR $__timeFilter("endDate")) AND
  trips.vehicle_vin = '$VIN'
ORDER BY 1 ASC

panels.title: Trips

panels.description: All charging sessions for the whole journey. Not all attributes can be filled automatically. If you want to make additions or changes use the ⚙ button at the end of each row. You can also add missing sessions.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  COALESCE (started, COALESCE (locked, connected)) AS "Date",
  COALESCE(locations."display_name", CONCAT_WS(', ', COALESCE(CONCAT_WS(', ', locations.name, locations.amenity), nullif(CONCAT_WS(' ', locations.road, locations.house_number), '')), locations.neighbourhood, locations.city, locations.postcode, locations.country)) AS "Location",
  EXTRACT('epoch' FROM (COALESCE (ended, COALESCE (unlocked, disconnected)) - COALESCE (started, COALESCE (locked, connected)))) AS "Duration",
  "maximumChargePower_kW" AS "Max. Power",
  (("endSOC_pct" - "startSOC_pct") * (
    CASE WHEN vehicles."carType" = 'ELECTRIC' THEN vehicle_settings."primary_capacity"::NUMERIC
         ELSE vehicle_settings."secondary_capacity"::NUMERIC
    END
    / 100::NUMERIC)) / (EXTRACT(epoch FROM (COALESCE(ended, COALESCE(unlocked, disconnected)) - COALESCE(started, COALESCE (locked, connected))))::NUMERIC / 3600::NUMERIC) AS "Avg. Power",
  acdc AS "AC/DC",
  "startSOC_pct" AS "% Start",
  "endSOC_pct" AS "% End",
  COALESCE("realCharged_kWh", COALESCE(("meterEnd_kWh"-"meterStart_kWh"),
  ("endSOC_pct" - "startSOC_pct") * (
    CASE WHEN vehicles."carType" = 'ELECTRIC' THEN vehicle_settings."primary_capacity"::NUMERIC
         ELSE vehicle_settings."secondary_capacity"::NUMERIC
    END
    / 100::NUMERIC))) AS "Amount",
  CASE WHEN "realCharged_kWh" IS NOT NULL THEN '✓'
       WHEN ("meterEnd_kWh"-"meterStart_kWh") IS NOT NULL THEN '✓'
       ELSE NULL
  END AS "✓",
  "realCost_ct"::NUMERIC/ 100 AS "Cost",
  "mileage_km" AS "Odometer",
  '⚙' AS "Edit",
  id,
  (round(extract(epoch FROM COALESCE (started, COALESCE (locked, connected))) - 10) * 1000) AS start_date_ts,
  COALESCE((round(extract(epoch FROM COALESCE (ended, COALESCE (unlocked, disconnected))) - 10) * 1000)::TEXT,'now') AS end_date_ts
FROM charging_sessions
LEFT JOIN locations ON charging_sessions.location_id = locations.osm_id
LEFT JOIN vehicles ON charging_sessions.vehicle_vin = vehicles.vin
LEFT JOIN vehicle_settings ON charging_sessions.vehicle_vin = vehicle_settings.vehicle_vin
WHERE
  ($__timeFilter(started) OR $__timeFilter(connected) OR $__timeFilter(locked)) AND
  charging_sessions.vehicle_vin = '$VIN'
ORDER BY 1 ASC

panels.title: Charges

panels.description: All refueling sessions for the whole journey. Not all attributes can be filled automatically. If you want to make additions or changes use the ⚙ button at the end of each row. You can also add missing sessions.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  date AS "Date",
  COALESCE(locations."display_name", CONCAT_WS(', ', COALESCE(CONCAT_WS(', ', locations.name, locations.amenity), nullif(CONCAT_WS(' ', locations.road, locations.house_number), '')), locations.neighbourhood, locations.city, locations.postcode, locations.country)) AS "Location",
  "startSOC_pct" AS "% Start",
  "endSOC_pct" AS "% End",
   ("endSOC_pct" - "startSOC_pct") * (vehicle_settings."primary_capacity"::NUMERIC / 100::NUMERIC) AS "Amount",
  CASE WHEN "realRefueled_l" IS NOT NULL THEN '✓'
       ELSE NULL
  END AS "✓",
  "realCost_ct"::NUMERIC/ 100 AS "Cost",
  "mileage_km" AS "Odometer",
  '⚙' AS "Edit",
  id,
  (round(extract(epoch FROM date)) * 1000) AS start_date_ts
FROM refuel_sessions
LEFT JOIN locations ON refuel_sessions.location_id = locations.osm_id
LEFT JOIN vehicles ON refuel_sessions.vehicle_vin = vehicles.vin
LEFT JOIN vehicle_settings ON refuel_sessions.vehicle_vin = vehicle_settings.vehicle_vin
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(date) AND
  refuel_sessions.vehicle_vin = '$VIN'
ORDER BY date

panels.title: Refueling

list.definition: SELECT "vin" || ':' || "nickname" || ' (' || "model" || ' - ' || "carType" || ')' FROM vehicles LEFT JOIN vehicle_settings ON vehicles.VIN = vehicle_settings.vehicle_vin WHERE vehicle_settings.hide IS NOT True ORDER BY vehicle_settings.sorting_order ASC
list.description: Select Car if you have multiple cars in your account
list.label: Car
list.name: VIN
list.query: SELECT "vin" || ':' || "nickname" || ' (' || "model" || ' - ' || "carType" || ')' FROM vehicles LEFT JOIN vehicle_settings ON vehicles.VIN = vehicle_settings.vehicle_vin WHERE vehicle_settings.hide IS NOT True ORDER BY vehicle_settings.sorting_order ASC

list.definition:
SELECT
    (FIRST_VALUE("startDate") OVER sd)  - INTERVAL '10' SECOND AS "Start"
  FROM trips
  WHERE
    ($__timeFilter("startDate") OR $__timeFilter("endDate")) AND
    trips.vehicle_vin = '$VIN'
  WINDOW sd as (ORDER BY "startDate" ASC ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND UNBOUNDED FOLLOWING)
  LIMIT 1
list.description: timestamp of the trimmed time of the journey
list.name: tripstart
list.query:
SELECT
    (FIRST_VALUE("startDate") OVER sd)  - INTERVAL '10' SECOND AS "Start"
  FROM trips
  WHERE
    ($__timeFilter("startDate") OR $__timeFilter("endDate")) AND
    trips.vehicle_vin = '$VIN'
  WINDOW sd as (ORDER BY "startDate" ASC ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND UNBOUNDED FOLLOWING)
  LIMIT 1

list.definition:
SELECT
    LAST_VALUE("endDate") OVER sd  + INTERVAL '10' SECOND AS "End"
  FROM trips
  WHERE
    ($__timeFilter("startDate") OR $__timeFilter("endDate")) AND
    trips.vehicle_vin = '$VIN'
  WINDOW sd as (ORDER BY "startDate" ASC ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND UNBOUNDED FOLLOWING)
  LIMIT 1
list.description: timestamp of the trimmed time of the journey
list.name: tripend
list.query:
SELECT
    LAST_VALUE("endDate") OVER sd  + INTERVAL '10' SECOND AS "End"
  FROM trips
  WHERE
    ($__timeFilter("startDate") OR $__timeFilter("endDate")) AND
    trips.vehicle_vin = '$VIN'
  WINDOW sd as (ORDER BY "startDate" ASC ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND UNBOUNDED FOLLOWING)
  LIMIT 1
